MAIL.ME.summary: Mail.ru Group Limited operates as an Internet company primarily in Russia and other CIS states. The company operates through Communications and Social, Games, and New Initiatives segments. The Communication and Social segment provides email, instant messaging, and portal as well as social network Vkontakte, OK, and My World. It also engages in user payments for virtual gifts, stickers and music subscriptions, online advertising, including display and context advertising. The Games segment provides online gaming services, including MMO, social and mobile games, games streaming and platform solutions under the MY.GAMES brand. The New Initiatives segment provides Youla classified advertising. The company was formerly known as Digital Sky Technologies Limited and changed its name to Mail.ru Group Limited in October 2010. Mail.ru Group Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Limassol, Cyprus.
